snippet: The price cut came ahead of the peak of back-to-school shopping and amid speculation that Amazon was preparing to introduce a new version of its Kindle Fire tablet.
abstract: Barnes & Noble cuts prices on three models of its Nook e-reader and tablet devices, ahead of the peak of back-to-school shopping and amid speculation that its rival, Amazon.com, is preparing to introduce a new version of its Kindle Fire tablet.
lead_paragraph: The price cut came ahead of the peak of back-to-school shopping and amid speculation that Amazon was preparing to introduce a new version of its Kindle Fire tablet.

headline.seo: Nook Prices Cut as Barnes & Noble Expects New Kindle Fire From Amazon
headline.main: Barnes & Noble Cuts Prices for Its Nook Devices
headline.print_headline: Barnes & Noble Cuts Prices for Its Nook Devices
